description:
KANDL ARTISTIQUE

Want to work with a product you love? KANDL ARTISTIQUE is seeking individuals who are passionate about home décor and fragrance, while creating the ultimate KANDL experience. We are an energetic, innovative and an engaged team, who values our people and their development. Not to mention, we offer employee discounts on our amazing products and a brand-new concept to the candle market.

We characterize our team as a band of avid brand enthusiasts who care deeply about our products, and work hard to achieve the best possible results. This position is perfect for someone who enjoys an organization that moves swiftly, and for someone who really cares about providing and demonstrating exceptional guest-service – and can correlate the behaviour with driving sales.

We are looking for an Inventory Associate who will be monitoring and maintaining current inventory levels.

Responsibilities:

Assess inventory output on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis to identify trends in productivity
Manage cycle counts of product inventories on a regular basis
Place and receive orders in a timely and accurate manner
Organize and maintain warehouse products
Assist with packaging and shipments
Coordinate and prepare products to facilitate labs
Knowledge, Skills and Abilities Required

Knowledge of supplies, equipment, and/or services ordering and inventory control.
Ability to reconcile stock counts to report data.
Database management skills.
Ability to receive, stock, and/or deliver goods.
Clerical, word processing, and/or office skills.
Working Conditions and Physical Effort

May require handling of objects that can weigh up to 50 lbs.
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Permanent

Salary: $18.00-$20.00 per hour

Schedule:

Monday to Friday
Weekend availability
Experience:

Inventory control: 1 year (preferred)
Retail: 1 year (preferred)
Work remotely:

No
title: Inventory Associciate, Kandl- Artistique
